title: Strengthening programming practical skills: Teacher collaborative learning design through Online Lesson Study (OLS)

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can explain collaborative learning processes using OLS stages and digital tools (Zoom, Google Drive).
Participants design knowledge-sharing and collaborative problem-solving strategies with teachers from other institutions based on boundary-crossing theory.
Participants create OLS-based research lesson plans for STEM-integrated classes in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
